response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product, which is valued at $1,200,000 to me. Given its immense worth and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its intrinsic value and potential benefits, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to its market value. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am confident that this product will exceed your expectations and provide substantial returns on your investment.", "product_price": 950000}
